title: Exam: Change Management & Innovation
description: Assessment of change management vocabulary and modal verbs for deduction.

items.explanation: We use 'must have' when we are almost certain about a past event based on evidence.
items.prompt: Which modal expresses a high degree of certainty that a past event occurred?

items.explanation: To streamline is to simplify a process.
items.prompt: We need to ________ our communication channels to ensure everyone receives updates simultaneously.

items.explanation: A bottleneck is a part of a process that slows everything else down.
items.prompt: Which term describes a point of congestion in a system that creates delays?
The team ________ (can't / receive) the email yesterday, otherwise they would have replied by now.

items.explanation: Incremental innovation refers to small, continuous improvements.
